attributes.action: change the law so that babies born before 24 weeks are registered
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I lost my little boy, Riley James back in Feb 2009. He was born at 22 weeks and 6 days gestation. If he was born 8 days later he would of recieved a birth and death certificate. He was recorded as a miscarriage. He was a little baby, my baby. perfectly formed, just too weak to survive. Please please sign this petition so the law can be changed. Many other women will go though this tragedy and I would hate for them to be told, just like i was, that their baby was just a miscarriage and will not be registered as a birth.
please get all your friends and family to sign. Thank you so much. I love you riley xxxxx

rejection.details:
There is another petition that covers this request - perhaps you would consider signing this one instead: 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/babiesunder/

Kind regards.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
